column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi J P - Thanks for the 5-star review! The analogy we like to use is this: If instant coffee is like the Top Ramen you ate in college
column2: then JINYA Ramen is like a cup of hot Starbucks. Definitely more expensive than Top Ramen
column3: but you can taste where the money goes! Thank you again for the kind words
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
